# Pact Community Organization

Welcome to the Pact Community Organization (PCO)! We're a community-driven organization focused on advancing Pact smart contract development through collaboration, education, and open-source contributions.

## What We Do

- **Maintain the Pact Contract Catalog**: A curated collection of high-quality, audited Pact smart contracts
- **Foster Community Collaboration**: Provide tools, documentation, and resources for Pact developers
- **Promote Best Practices**: Establish standards and guidelines for secure, maintainable Pact contracts
- **Support Learning**: Create educational resources and onboarding materials for new developers

## Our Projects

- **[pact-contract-catalog](https://github.com/Pact-Community-Organization/pact-contract-catalog)**: Trusted registry of reusable Pact contracts
- **[foundation](https://github.com/Pact-Community-Organization/foundation)**: Governance, documentation, and community resources
- **[website](https://github.com/Pact-Community-Organization/website)**: Community website and documentation portal

## Get Involved

We welcome contributions from developers of all skill levels! Here's how you can get started:

1. **Explore Our Repositories**: Check out our projects and see where you can contribute
2. **Read the Documentation**: Visit our [foundation docs](https://github.com/Pact-Community-Organization/foundation) for guides and policies
3. **Join the Discussion**: Participate in GitHub issues and discussions
4. **Submit Contributions**: Follow our contribution guidelines for each project

## Community Guidelines

- Be respectful and inclusive
- Follow our [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/Pact-Community-Organization/foundation/blob/main/community/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- Focus on constructive collaboration
- Help newcomers learn and grow

## Contact

- **GitHub Discussions**: For general questions and community chat
- **Issues**: For bug reports and feature requests
- **Documentation**: Comprehensive guides in our foundation repository

---

*PCO is an independent, community-driven organization not affiliated with any specific blockchain platform.*
